{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.0M in 2021-2022** on contracts with DOMUS BUILDING CLEANING.

Across 27 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 3 have at least one amendment (11%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 351% and the average number of amendments was 5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$15.3M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.94 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$782.1K. The longest contract was 10.02 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$17.5M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [DOMUS BUILDING CLEANING](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22DOMUS%20BUILDING%20CLEANING%22)
- [DOMUS BUILDING CLEANING COMPANY LIMITED](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22DOMUS%20BUILDING%20CLEANING%20COMPANY%20LIMITED%22)
{{< /details >}}
